title: Having multiple offline pods results in duplicated CIs
content:
If you have multiple offline pods and Native SACM enabled, duplicated CIs are synchronized from UCMDB to Service Management.

Cause

According to the Supportability table in Suite enterprise readiness, the itom-xruntime-platform-offline pod can't be scaled. That is, only one offline pod is supported. 

Solution

Make sure there is only one offline pod.
